parameter-group.name: sunsetwx-credentials
parameter-group.label: SunsetWx Credentials
parameter-group.description: Email address and password needed to login to SunsetWx service

parameter-group.name: sunsetwx-parameters
parameter-group.label: SunsetWx Parameters
parameter-group.description: Parameters needed by the SunsetWx quality API

parameter.name: emailAddress
parameter.label: Email Address
parameter.description: Email address used to login to SunsetWx service

parameter.name: password
parameter.label: Password
parameter.description: Password used to login to SunsetWx service

parameter.name: geoLocation
parameter.label: Geo Location
parameter.description: Longitude and latitude separated by a comma (e.g. -77.856128,40.812180)

parameter.name: limit
parameter.label: Limit
parameter.description: Upper limit on number of features in SunsetWx response

parameter.name: location
parameter.label: Location
parameter.description: Determines resolution of features in SunsetWx response

parameter.name: updateFrequency
parameter.label: Update Frequency
parameter.description: Frequency to request quality updates from SunsetWx (in minutes)
